laboratory_examinations.findings: Glucose of 53 mg/dL, protein of 102.6 mg/dL, 155 white blood cells/mL with 80% lymphocytes. Cytology and flow cytometry were normal.

Homogeneously enhancing infundibular process involving the optic chiasm, pituitary, and hypothalamus with T2/fluid-attenuated inversion recovery hyperintensity in the basal ganglia and surrounding subcortical white matter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Showed nodular enhancement in the left optic nerve on follow-up.
